languages.text: {n}Эвейн смущенно поднимает брови.{/n} "В такую минуту, как эта, благородное сословие предпочитает беречься в фамильных бункерах, а не разгуливать по местам вроде этого. Я вижу, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вас{/d} отличает тяга к авантюрам".

{n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."
languages.original_text: {n}Эвейн смущенно поднимает брови.{/n} "В такую минуту, как эта, благородное сословие предпочитает беречься в фамильных бункерах, а не разгуливать по местам вроде этого. Я вижу, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вас{/d} отличает тяга к авантюрам".

{n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

{n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

languages.text: {n}Evayne zieht nervös die Augenbrauen hoch.{/n} "In Zeiten wie diesen zieht der Adel üblicherweise die Sicherheit des Familienbunkers derart wenig einladenden Orten vor. {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Ihr{/d} hingegen scheint mir etwas wagemutiger zu sein."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne zieht nervös die Augenbrauen hoch.{/n} "In Zeiten wie diesen zieht der Adel üblicherweise die Sicherheit des Familienbunkers derart wenig einladenden Orten vor."

languages.text: {n}Evayne hausse les sourcils, légèrement confus.{/n} « Par les temps qui courent, la noblesse préfère généralement la sécurité de ses bunkers aux endroits peu accueillants comme celui-ci. Pour votre part, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}vous{/d} semblez plus {mf|attiré|attirée} par le danger et les hauts faits, à ce que je vois. »
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne hausse les sourcils, légèrement confus.{/n} « Par les temps qui courent, la noblesse préfère généralement la sécurité de ses bunkers aux endroits peu accueillants comme celui-ci. Pour votre part, {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}vous{/d} semblez plus {mf|attiré|attirée} par le danger et les hauts faits, à ce que je vois. »

languages.text: {n}艾维尼扬起了眉毛，似乎有些慌乱。{/n}“像这种时候，贵族通常会躲在安全的家族地堡之中，不会跑到这种危险的地方。不过，我看得出来，{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}您{/d}更喜欢大胆的计划。”
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾维尼扬起了眉毛，似乎有些慌乱。{/n}“像这种时候，贵族通常会躲在安全的家族地堡之中，不会跑到这种危险的地方。”

languages.text: {n}エヴァインは、少し動揺したように眉を吊り上げた。{/n}「今のご時世、貴族はそういう辺ぴな場所よりも家族用バンカーでの安全な暮らしを好むものだがな。しかし{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}あなた{/d}は大胆に行動するほうがお好きのようだね」
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

traits.locale_text: {n}エヴァインは、幾分動揺したように眉を吊り上げた。{/n}「今のご時世、貴族はそんな嫌な場所より安全な家のバンカーにいたいと思うのが普通だからね」
{n}エヴァインは、少し動揺したように眉を吊り上げた。{/n}「今のご時世、貴族はそういう辺ぴな場所よりも家族用バンカーでの安全な暮らしを好むものだがな。しかし{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}あなた{/d}は大胆に行動するほうがお好きのようだね」

languages.text: {n}Evayne arquea las cejas, un tanto confuso.{/n} «En tiempos como este, la nobleza suele preferir la seguridad de los búnkeres familiares a lugares tan poco acogedores. Pero veo que {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}usted{/d} prefiere la audacia».
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne arquea las cejas, un tanto confuso.{/n} «En tiempos como este, la nobleza suele preferir la seguridad de los búnkeres familiares a lugares tan poco acogedores».

languages.text: {n}Evayne, biraz garipseyerek kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Böylesi zamanlarda soylular, genellikle aile sığınaklarının güvenliğini bu tür davetkâr olmayan yerlere yeğlerler. Lâkin görüyorum ki {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}siz{/d} ondan ziyade cüretkâr eylemlere yöneliyorsunuz."
languages.original_text: {n}Evayne raises his eyebrows, somewhat flustered.{/n} "In times like these, nobility usually prefers the safety of family bunkers to such uninviting places. Yet {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}you{/d} are more drawn to acts of daring, I see."

traits.locale_text: {n}Evayne, biraz garipseyerek kaşlarını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Böylesi zamanlarda soylular, genellikle aile sığınaklarının güvenliğini bu tür davetkâr olmayan yerlere yeğlerler. Lâkin görüyorum ki {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}siz{/d} ondan ziyade cüretkâr eylemlere yöneliyorsunuz."
